title: Publish MSBuild.StructuredLogger from our repo
body:
We are working on making the task of maintaining the binlogs and the binlog log viewer easier for @KirillOsenkov. 
So, for that we need to:

- [ ]  Publish the [MSBuild.StructuredLogger](https://www.nuget.org/packages/MSBuild.StructuredLogger) from the MSBuild repo.
   - [ ] Coordinate how this release will work.
   - [ ] Publish and document the publishing process.
- [ ] Remove duplicated code from the binlog viewer.
